attacks.name: Flower Aroma
attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from Shaymin. The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Damage Aid
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 30 damage plus 50 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from the Defending Pokémon.
